mapper.select: select ID, ORDERID, COMPANYID, BUYERLOGINID, BUYERUSERID, BUYERNAME, SHOPID, CREATEDTIME, ORDERSTATUS, FIRSTNAME, LASTNAME, PAIDTIME, TIMEOUTLEFTTIME, CLOSETIME, FUNDSTATUS, SALESRECORDNUMBER, STREET1, STREET2, CITY, PROVINCE, COUNTRYEN, COUNTRYCN, COUNTRYCODE, PHONE1, PHONE2, POSTALCODE, EMAIL, ITEMTOTALORIGIN, SHIPPINGCOSTORIGIN, ORDERTOTALORIGIN, PLATFORMFEEORIGIN, INSURANCEFEEORIGIN, CURRENCYID, PAYPALFEEORIGIN, PAYPALCURRENCYID, PAYPALID, SHIPPINGSERVICE, BUYERCHECKOUTMESSAGE, IMPORTID, SHIPPINGSERVICETYPE, ISSUESTATUS, FROZENSTATUS, SELLERSIGNERFULLNAME, PAIDFLAG, ALLIANCEFEE, LOGISTICSNO, LOGISTICSSERVICENAME, ISSAVE, OPERTIME, ITEMJSON from DB_ORIGINALIORDER where ID = #{id,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
